channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-4057|2024-08-05T14:39:41.156Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) 3.10, 3.8, 3.6, 3.4 allows remote authenticated users to gain elevated privileges via the GUI or GUI terminal commands.

item.title: CVE-2017-4016|2024-08-05T14:39:41.472Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28ndlp%29
item.description: Web Server method disclosure in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote attackers to exploit and find another hole via HTTP response header.

item.title: CVE-2017-4012|2024-08-05T14:39:41.551Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28ndlp%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote authenticated users to view confidential information via modification of the HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2017-4017|2024-08-05T14:39:41.319Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28ndlp%29
item.description: User Name Disclosure in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote attackers to view user information via the appliance web interface.

item.title: CVE-2017-3968|2024-08-05T14:39:41.141Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Session fixation vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Manager (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 and McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) before 9.3.4.1.5 allows remote attackers to disclose sensitive information or manipulate the database via a crafted authentication cookie.

item.title: CVE-2017-3935|2024-08-05T14:39:41.214Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: Network Data Loss Prevention is vulnerable to MIME type sniffing which allows older versions of Internet Explorer to perform MIME-sniffing on the response body, potentially causing the response body to be interpreted and displayed as a content type other than the intended content type.

item.title: CVE-2017-4015|2024-08-05T14:39:41.373Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28ndlp%29
item.description: Clickjacking vulnerability in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via HTTP response header.

item.title: CVE-2017-3912|2024-08-05T14:39:41.145Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20application%20control%20and%20change%20control%20%28macc%29
item.description: Bypassing password security vulnerability in McAfee Application and Change Control (MACC) 7.0.1 and 6.2.0 allows authenticated users to perform arbitrary command execution via a command-line utility.

item.title: CVE-2017-3962|2024-08-05T14:39:41.359Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Password recovery exploitation vulnerability in the non-certificate-based authentication mechanism in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows attackers to crack user passwords via unsalted hashes.

item.title: CVE-2018-6672|2024-08-05T06:10:11.360Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchestrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: Information disclosure vulnerability in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) 5.3.0 through 5.3.3 and 5.9.0 through 5.9.1 allows authenticated users to view sensitive information in plain text format via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-4013|2024-08-05T14:39:41.154Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28ndlp%29
item.description: Banner Disclosure in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote attackers to obtain product information via HTTP response header.

item.title: CVE-2017-3961|2024-08-05T14:39:41.300Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows authenticated users to allow arbitrary HTML code to be reflected in the response web page via crafted user input of attributes.

item.title: CVE-2018-6682|2024-08-05T06:10:10.927Z -- mcafee -- true%20key%20%28tk%29
item.description: Cross Site Scripting Exposure in McAfee True Key (TK) 4.0.0.0 and earlier allows local users to expose confidential data via a crafted web site.

item.title: CVE-2018-6669|2024-08-05T06:10:11.290Z -- mcafee -- application%20and%20change%20control
item.description: A whitelist bypass vulnerability in McAfee Application Control / Change Control 7.0.1 and before allows a remote or local user to execute blacklisted files through an ASP.NET form.

item.title: CVE-2018-6690|2024-08-05T06:10:11.285Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20application%20control%20%28mac%29
item.description: Accessing, modifying, or executing executable files vulnerability in Microsoft Windows client in McAfee Application and Change Control (MACC) 8.0.0 Hotfix 4 and earlier allows authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via file transfer from external system.

item.title: CVE-2018-6706|2024-08-05T06:10:11.248Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20agent%20%28ma%29%20for%20linux
item.description: Insecure handling of temporary files in non-Windows McAfee Agent 5.0.0 through 5.0.6, 5.5.0, and 5.5.1 allows an Unprivileged User to introduce custom paths during agent installation in Linux via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-4014|2024-08-05T14:39:41.150Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28ndlp%29
item.description: Session Side jacking vulnerability in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote authenticated users to view, add, and remove users via modification of the HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2018-6670|2024-08-05T06:10:11.275Z -- mcafee -- common%20ui%20%28cui%29
item.description: External Entity Attack vulnerability in the ePO extension in McAfee Common UI (CUI) 2.0.2 allows remote authenticated users to view confidential information via a crafted HTTP request parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-6695|2024-08-05T06:10:11.461Z -- mcafee -- threat%20intelligence%20exchange%20server%20%28tie%20server%29
item.description: SSH host keys generation vulnerability in the server in McAfee Threat Intelligence Exchange Server (TIE Server) 1.3.0, 2.0.x, 2.1.x, 2.2.0 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers via acquiring keys from another environment.

item.title: CVE-2018-6664|2024-08-05T06:10:10.839Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention%20%28dlp%29%20endpoint
item.description: Application Protections Bypass vulnerability in Microsoft Windows in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Endpoint before 10.0.500 and DLP Endpoint before 11.0.400 allows authenticated users to bypass the product block action via a command-line utility.

item.title: CVE-2018-6661|2024-08-05T06:10:11.310Z -- mcafee -- true%20key
item.description: DLL Side-Loading vulnerability in Microsoft Windows Client in McAfee True Key before 4.20.110 allows local users to gain privilege elevation via not verifying a particular DLL file signature.

item.title: CVE-2018-6700|2024-08-05T06:10:11.361Z -- mcafee -- true%20key%20%28tk%29
item.description: DLL Search Order Hijacking vulnerability in Microsoft Windows Client in McAfee True Key (TK) before 5.1.165 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via specially crafted malware.

item.title: CVE-2018-6689|2024-08-05T06:10:11.222Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention%20endpoint%20%28dlpe%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention Endpoint (DLPe) 10.0.x earlier than 10.0.510, and 11.0.x earlier than 11.0.600 allows attackers to bypass local security protection via specific conditions.

item.title: CVE-2018-6662|2024-08-05T06:10:11.357Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20management%20of%20native%20encryption%20%28mne%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Management of Native Encryption (MNE) before 4.1.4 allows local users to gain elevated privileges via a crafted user input.

item.title: CVE-2018-6667|2024-08-05T06:10:10.815Z -- mcafee -- web%20gateway
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in the administrative user interface in McAfee Web Gateway 7.8.1.0 through 7.8.1.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via Java management extensions (JMX).

item.title: CVE-2018-6704|2024-08-05T06:10:11.255Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20agent%20%28ma%29%20for%20linux
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in McAfee Agent (MA) for Linux 5.0.0 through 5.0.6, 5.5.0, and 5.5.1 allows local users to perform arbitrary command execution via specific conditions.

item.title: CVE-2018-6707|2024-08-05T06:10:11.379Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20agent%20%28ma%29%20non-windows%20non-windows%20versions
item.description: Denial of Service through Resource Depletion vulnerability in the agent in non-Windows McAfee Agent (MA) 5.0.0 through 5.0.6, 5.5.0, and 5.5.1 allows local users to cause DoS, unexpected behavior, or potentially unauthorized code execution via knowledge of the internal trust mechanism.

item.title: CVE-2017-3936|2024-08-05T14:39:41.148Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchestrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: OS Command Injection vulnerability in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) 5.9.0, 5.3.2, 5.3.1, 5.1.3, 5.1.2, 5.1.1, and 5.1.0 allows attackers to run arbitrary OS commands with limited privileges via not sanitizing the user input data before exporting it into a CSV format output.

item.title: CVE-2017-3972|2024-08-05T14:39:41.302Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Infrastructure-based foot printing vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via the server banner leaking potentially sensitive or security relevant information.

item.title: CVE-2018-6660|2024-08-05T06:10:11.322Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchestrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: Directory Traversal vulnerability in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) 5.3.2, 5.3.1, 5.3.0 and 5.9.0 allows administrators to use Windows alternate data streams, which could be used to bypass the file extensions, via not properly validating the path when exporting a particular XML file.

item.title: CVE-2018-6668|2024-08-05T06:10:11.365Z -- mcafee -- application%20and%20change%20control
item.description: A whitelist bypass vulnerability in McAfee Application Control / Change Control 7.0.1 and before allows execution bypass, for example, with simple DLL through interpreters such as PowerShell.

item.title: CVE-2018-6757|2024-08-05T06:10:11.374Z -- mcafee -- true%20key
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in Microsoft Windows client in McAfee True Key (TK) 5.1.230.7 and earlier allows local users to execute arbitrary code via specially crafted malware.

item.title: CVE-2017-4011|2024-08-05T14:39:41.176Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention%20%28ndlp%29
item.description: Embedding Script (XSS) in HTTP Headers vulnerability in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote attackers to get session/cookie information via modification of the HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2018-6677|2024-08-05T06:10:10.756Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Directory Traversal vulnerability in the administrative user interface in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) MWG 7.8.1.x allows authenticated administrator users to gain elevated privileges via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-6705|2024-08-05T06:10:11.359Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20agent%20%28ma%29%20for%20linux
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in McAfee Agent (MA) for Linux 5.0.0 through 5.0.6, 5.5.0, and 5.5.1 allows local users to perform arbitrary command execution via specific conditions.

item.title: CVE-2017-3980|2024-08-05T14:39:41.155Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchestrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in the ePO Extension in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) 5.9.0, 5.3.2, and 5.1.3 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to execute a command of their choice via an authenticated ePO session.

item.title: CVE-2017-3934|2024-08-05T14:39:41.376Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: Missing HTTP Strict Transport Security state information vulnerability in the server in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows man-in-the-middle attackers to expose confidential data via read files on the webserver.

item.title: CVE-2018-6681|2024-08-05T06:10:11.272Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Abuse of Functionality vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) 9.1.7.11 and earlier allows authenticated users to allow arbitrary HTML code to be reflected in the response web page via appliance web interface.

item.title: CVE-2017-4053|2024-08-05T14:39:41.372Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Command Injection vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) 3.10, 3.8, 3.6, 3.4 allows remote unauthenticated users / remote attackers to execute a command of their choice via a crafted HTTP request parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-3933|2024-08-05T14:39:41.106Z -- mcafee -- network%20data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: Embedding Script (XSS) in HTTP Headers vulnerability in McAfee Network Data Loss Prevention (NDLP) 9.3.x allows remote authenticated users to view confidential information via a cross site request forgery attack.

item.title: CVE-2017-4028|2024-08-05T14:39:41.295Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20anti-virus%20plus%20%28avp%29
item.description: Maliciously misconfigured registry vulnerability in all Microsoft Windows products in McAfee consumer and corporate products allows an administrator to inject arbitrary code into a debugged McAfee process via manipulation of registry parameters.

item.title: CVE-2018-6678|2024-08-05T06:10:11.375Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Configuration/Environment manipulation vulnerability in the administrative interface in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) MWG 7.8.1.x allows authenticated administrator users to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-3897|2024-08-05T14:39:41.087Z -- mcafee -- live%20safe
item.description: A Code Injection vulnerability in the non-certificate-based authentication mechanism in McAfee Live Safe versions prior to 16.0.3 and McAfee Security Scan Plus (MSS+) versions prior to 3.11.599.3 allows network attackers to perform a malicious file execution via a HTTP backend-response.

item.title: CVE-2018-6683|2024-08-05T06:10:10.754Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention%20%28dlp%29%20for%20windows
item.description: Exploiting Incorrectly Configured Access Control Security Levels vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) for Windows versions prior to 10.0.505 and 11.0.405 allows local users to bypass DLP policy via editing of local policy files when offline.

item.title: CVE-2017-4054|2024-08-05T14:39:41.454Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Command Injection vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) 3.10, 3.8, 3.6, 3.4 allows remote authenticated users to execute a command of their choice via a crafted HTTP request parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-4055|2024-08-05T14:39:41.274Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Exploitation of Authentication vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) 3.10, 3.8, 3.6, 3.4 allows remote unauthenticated users / remote attackers to bypass ATD detection via loose enforcement of authentication and authorization.

item.title: CVE-2017-3967|2024-08-05T14:39:41.288Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Target influence via framing vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via application pages inability to break out of 3rd party HTML frames.

item.title: CVE-2018-6659|2024-08-05T06:10:10.952Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchestrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) 5.3.2, 5.3.1, 5.3.0 and 5.9.0 allows remote authenticated users to exploit an XSS issue via not sanitizing the user input.

item.title: CVE-2017-3966|2024-08-05T14:39:41.183Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Exploitation of session variables, resource IDs and other trusted credentials vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows remote attackers to exploit or harm a user's browser via reusing the exposed session token in the application URL.

item.title: CVE-2017-3965|2024-08-05T14:39:41.151Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) (aka Session Riding) vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows remote attackers to perform unauthorized tasks such as retrieving internal system information or manipulating the database via specially crafted URLs.

item.title: CVE-2018-6755|2024-08-05T06:10:11.371Z -- mcafee -- true%20key
item.description: Weak Directory Permission Vulnerability in Microsoft Windows client in McAfee True Key (TK) 5.1.230.7 and earlier allows local users to execute arbitrary code via specially crafted malware.

item.title: CVE-2017-3969|2024-08-05T14:39:41.332Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Abuse of communication channels vulnerability in the server in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to decrypt messages via an inadequate implementation of SSL.

item.title: CVE-2017-3948|2024-08-05T14:39:41.517Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention%20endpoint%20%28dlpe%29
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) in IMG Tags in the ePO extension in McAfee Data Loss Prevention Endpoint (DLP Endpoint) 10.0.x allows authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via injecting malicious JavaScript into a user's browsing session.

item.title: CVE-2017-3971|2024-08-05T14:39:41.119Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cryptanalysis vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows attackers to view confidential information via insecure use of RC4 encryption cyphers.

item.title: CVE-2018-6686|2024-08-05T06:10:10.705Z -- mcafee -- drive%20encryption%20%28mde%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in TPM autoboot in McAfee Drive Encryption (MDE) 7.1.0 and above allows physically proximate attackers to bypass local security protection via specific set of circumstances.

item.title: CVE-2017-3907|2024-08-05T14:39:41.324Z -- mcafee -- threat%20intelligence%20exchange%20%28tie%29%20server
item.description: Code Injection vulnerability in the ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) extension in McAfee Threat Intelligence Exchange (TIE) Server 2.1.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary HTML code to be reflected in the response web page via unspecified vector.

item.title: CVE-2017-3960|2024-08-05T14:39:41.152Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Exploitation of Authorization vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows authenticated users to gain elevated privileges via a crafted HTTP request parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-6693|2024-08-05T06:10:11.241Z -- mcafee -- endpoint%20security%20for%20linux%20threat%20prevention%20%28ensltp%29
item.description: An unprivileged user can delete arbitrary files on a Linux system running ENSLTP 10.5.1, 10.5.0, and 10.2.3 Hotfix 1246778 and earlier. By exploiting a time of check to time of use (TOCTOU) race condition during a specific scanning sequence, the unprivileged user is able to perform a privilege escalation to delete arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2017-4052|2024-08-05T14:39:41.366Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) 3.10, 3.8, 3.6, 3.4 allows remote unauthenticated users / remote attackers to change or update any configuration settings, or gain administrator functionality via a crafted HTTP request parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-6671|2024-08-05T06:10:11.361Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchestrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: Application Protection Bypass vulnerability in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) 5.3.0 through 5.3.3 and 5.9.0 through 5.9.1 allows remote authenticated users to bypass localhost only access security protection for some ePO features via a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2017-3964|2024-08-05T14:39:41.134Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Reflective Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) before 8.2.7.42.2 allows attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a URL parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-3898|2024-08-05T14:39:41.184Z -- mcafee -- live%20safe
item.description: A man-in-the-middle attack vulnerability in the non-certificate-based authentication mechanism in McAfee LiveSafe (MLS) versions prior to 16.0.3 allows network attackers to modify the Windows registry value associated with the McAfee update via the HTTP backend-response.

item.title: CVE-2018-6756|2024-08-05T06:10:11.276Z -- mcafee -- true%20key
item.description: Authentication Abuse vulnerability in Microsoft Windows client in McAfee True Key (TK) 5.1.230.7 and earlier allows local users to execute unauthorized commands via specially crafted malware.
